sub_title: Team Coordinator - HR - Governance - Events - Int. Communication - at Africa-Europe Diaspora Development Platform (ADEPT)
summary:
Highly skilled in the provision of effective executive support to ensure the seamless execution of daily operations. Proven ability to build productive relationships with external departments and stakeholders and to inspire the achievement of company requirements. Strong experience in the coordination of business events and skilled in complex travel and agenda management. Her background in journalism helps writing papers, terms of reference, reports and plans, whenever necessary.

Specialized in business communication, worked as communication officer and manager assistant for multinational companies, doing legislative monitoring with market impact analysis and organizing business events. Based in Brussels since 1998, having worked until 2004 as an international correspondent for economic newspapers. 

Hold two master’s degree: Communication from the University of São Paulo (USP) and European Studies from the Free University of Brussels (ULB).
